name: GameJam Sarcrifices
description:
A game about participating in gamejams and the sacrifices you have to make.

Everything in the game was made by us except for some small things.
We do not feel like we should be excluded from the voting based on this but will mention the credits seperately:

Used for the party music: "Can't stop my feet - Loyalty Freak Music (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Loyalty_Freak_Music/)

Used for the stomach rumbling: https://freesound.org/people/Otakua/sounds/219909/

The phone ringtone and phone game sound were inspired (but recreated/adapted) by  the apple ringtone
and Amalgamation from ExileLord
